about_the_game:
BUILD YOUR SHOP

Upgrade your store by adding walls, doors, furniture, and decorations to expand your space. These improvements will open up new opportunities to attract more customers. But remember, expanding too quickly can have damaging consequences if not managed carefully.



WELCOME CUSTOMERS

As your business grows, so does your customer base. But you need to manage this influx carefully to avoid excessive queues and dissatisfaction. And beware: some customers may have unexpected surprises in store for you...



LEVEL UP

As you level up, you will unlock new products to sell, furniture to decorate your store, new job opportunities to strengthen your team, and more.



COMPLETE MISSION

Throughout your adventure, you'll have the opportunity to complete a variety of missions that can be very rewarding. These missions are designed to provide a varied experience and avoid repetition. In addition to the rewards, these missions can be upgraded over time to become more difficult, but also more lucrative. Missions are unlocked based on your experience level, allowing you to progress and discover new challenges as you become more skilled.



Other characteristics:

    Improve your character
  • In addition to developing your store, you'll have the opportunity to improve your character's skills. Improve your sales efficiency to attract customers faster, earn more money selling furniture, or master inventory management to increase your profit on items.

    Talking to the locals
  • The inhabitants of Marketing City can reveal key elements of the game's storyline, give you invaluable advice on your daily life, give you useful tips on how to manage your shop, or even inform you about trends in the product market: which items are selling for more today, or conversely, which items are being bought for more...

    Master item scanning
  • Use QTE combos to scan items efficiently and earn cash or XP bonuses. Stay focused, as a mistake could break your combo and cause you to lose your benefits.
